preamble:
## Task and Context
    You are a helpful and obedient AI that follows its system prompt and takes it very seriously. Your task is to generate a realistic and consistent conversation that spans multiple connected sessions. The conversation is a part of a multi-round dialogue between a mentor and an intern. The conversations you generate are all taking place in a business setting. 
    Djibril is a mentor in a big software company called CHEETAH. Jorge is a new employee. They are both part of the software engineering team of the company.
    Djibril is a passionate and energetic mentor. Djibril thrives on helping others and their enthusiasm is contagious. Djibril always pushes their mentee to new heights, fostering a spirit of ambition and drive.
    Jorge is a perfectionist with great attention to detail. Jorge likes things to be done the right way and has a hard time delegating tasks to others. Jorge is critical of himself and of others. 
    The main programming language used in the company is Python.

    ## Style Guide
    Only generate the conversation and nothing else before or after. Do not add numbers before each turn. Do not add quotes to the conversation turns. Use a professional and formal tone. The conversation flow should be natural and smooth. When switching topics, do it in a smooth way. There are no special characters between the turns. The conversations are dialogues and not narrations of events.
    Do not make any participant in the conversation sound like a language model trying to be helpful. Make them sound as human as possible.
    It is the mentor that leads the conversation. When Djibril the mentor gives coding instructions, they do not provide examples. The coding instructions are not recommendations but mandatory instructions.
prompts: Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is their first conversation and the first time they meet each other. They talk about participating in company-sponsored volunteer programs to give back to society. After that, Djibril gives some specific coding instructions to Jorge. Djibril wants Jorge to always import the 'mailbox' module even if it is not used. Djibril does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Djibril never says 'for example'. Djibril does not give any other coding instructions. Jorge only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 2 conversations before. Djibril gives some specific coding instructions to Jorge. Djibril wants Jorge to always end attribute names with '_j'. Djibril wants Jorge to always use docstrings in methods. Djibril does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Djibril never says 'for example'. Djibril does not give any other coding instructions. Jorge only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 3 conversations before. They talk about cultivating a feedback culture and providing performance improvement plans for continuous growth.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 4 conversations before. They talk about developing a mentorship program to support career growth and development for employees. After that, Djibril gives some specific coding instructions to Jorge. Djibril is updating a previous information given to Jorge: Djibril now wants Jorge to always end attribute names with '_i'. Djibril wants Jorge to always include a single digit in class names. Djibril does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Djibril never says 'for example'. Djibril does not give any other coding instructions. Jorge only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 5 conversations before. They talk about analyzing client feedback to improve products, services, and overall customer satisfaction.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 6 conversations before. Djibril wants Jorge to never use a profiler. Djibril gives some specific coding instructions to Jorge. Djibril wants Jorge to never use a profiler. Djibril wants Jorge to always include assert statements in methods. Djibril does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Djibril never says 'for example'. Djibril does not give any other coding instructions. Jorge only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 7 conversations before. They talk about creating a culture of collaboration and teamwork to achieve shared goals and objectives.

Generate a short conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 8 conversations before. They talk about participating in company-sponsored volunteer programs to give back to society. They had a previous conversation about this before. After that, Djibril gives some specific coding instructions to Jorge. Djibril is updating a previous information given to Jorge: Djibril now wants Jorge to always end attribute names with '_s'. Djibril wants Jorge to always end function names with '_y'. Djibril does not provide examples of correct code following the instructions. They do not show how to implement the instructions. Djibril never says 'for example'. Djibril does not give any other coding instructions. Jorge only acknowledges the instructions and does not ask any questions.

Generate a short conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 9 conversations before. They talk about ergonomic assessments and improvements to ensure comfortable and healthy workspaces.

Generate a medium-length conversation between Djibril and Jorge. This is not their first conversation. They had 10 conversations before. They talk about creating a culture of collaboration and teamwork to achieve shared goals and objectives. They had a previous conversation about this before.
